proximity;scroll-snap-points-x:repeat(100%);scroll-snap-type:mandatory;scroll-snap-destination:100% 0;padding-top:0;padding-bottom:calc(.75 * var(30px));margin-bottom:calc(-.25 * var(30px));-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch}.mrd-grid-mask{mask:linear-gradient(-90deg,rgba(0,0,0,0) 0,black 10%);-webkit-mask:linear-gradient(-90deg,rgba(0,0,0,0.3) 0,rgba(0,0,0,1.0) 3%,rgba(0,0,0,1.0) 97%,rgba(0,0,0,0.3) 100%)}.mrd-grid-image{background:#fff;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:flex-start;justify-items:flex-start;scroll-snap-align:center;transition:all var(0.3s);padding:0;text-decoration:none;border:1px solid #aaa;text-align:center;margin:0 10px;border-bottom:10px solid #ccc;position:relative}.mrd-grid-title{margin:0;font-family:Helvetica;font-size:14px;color:#333;width:100%;padding:2px 5px;box-sizing:border-box}.mrd-grid-image img:not(.mrd_spncr){width:100%;background:#ccc}}.mrd-grid-modal{position:fixed;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;left:0;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.9);display:none;z-index:1000;overflow:hidden}.mrd-grid-modal-close{position:absolute;height:30px;width:30px;top:10px;right:10px;color:#fff;font-size:30px;z-index:1000}.mrd-grid-modal-block{height:100%}.mrd-grid-modal-block-bg{background-size:100%;background-clip:content-box;background-position:center center;background-repeat:no-repeat no-repeat;height:100%;max-width:1024px;margin:auto}.mrd-grid-modal img{height:100%;width:100%}.mrd_spncr{position:absolute;right:3px;top:3px;width:44px;height:44px}.mrd-grid-modal .mrd-grid-title{background:rgba(0,0,0,0.5);color:#fff;font-size:24px;left:0;margin:0;padding:10px 60px 10px 10px;position:absolute;text-align:left;top:0;width:100%}#mrd-wx-alerts{background:#fff;margin:0!important;padding:0!important;font-family:"Open Sans";border-top:1px solid #800}#mrd-wx-alerts .weather-index-alerts{font-size:16px;line-height:1.2}#mrd-wx-alerts .btn-lg{padding:10px 15px}#mrd-wx-alerts .modal-body img{width:100%;position:relative;border:1px solid #ccc}#mrd-wx-alerts .modal-body pre{font-size:11px;margin-bottom:20px}#mrd-wx-alerts h5{font-size:16px;line-height:1.3;font-family:"Fira Sans";margin:0 0 6px}@media(max-width:767px){#mrd-wx-alerts{border-top:0;border-bottom:10px solid #800}}.hada{display:none!important}#privacy-policy{background:#fff;padding:10px;font-family:'Helvetica Neue',Helvetica,sans-serif!important}#privacy-policy a{color:#039}#privacy-policy a:hover{text-decoration:underline}#privacy-policy ol,#privacy-policy ul{margin-inline-start:-20px}#privacy-policy .table-responsive>.table>thead>tr>th,#privacy-policy .table-responsive>.table>tbody>tr>th,#privacy-policy .table-responsive>.table>tfoot>tr>th,#privacy-policy .table-responsive>.table>thead>tr>td,#privacy-policy .table-responsive>.table>tbody>tr>td,#privacy-policy .table-responsive>.table>tfoot>tr>td{white-space:normal}

div.p: Mostly cloudy. Highs in the low 40s and lows in the mid 30s.
Showers. Highs in the upper 40s and lows in the mid 30s.
A few clouds. Highs in the low 50s and lows in the mid 30s.
Chance of afternoon showers. Highs in the upper 40s and lows in the upper 30s.
Partly cloudy. Highs in the upper 40s and lows in the low 30s.
Mix of sun and clouds. Highs in the mid 50s and lows in the upper 30s.
Chance of showers. Highs in the upper 50s and lows in the low 40s.
